00031 
00032 #include "egs_input.h"
00033 #include "egs_object_factory.h"
00034 #include "egs_base_source.h"
00035 #include "egs_rndm.h"
00036 
00037 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00038 
00039     if( argc < 2 ) egsFatal("Usage: %s input_file\n",argv[0]);
00040 
00041     EGS_Input input; input.setContentFromFile(argv[1]);
00042     EGS_ObjectFactory *factory = new EGS_ObjectFactory("egs++/dso/gcc");
00043 
00044     EGS_Object *o = factory->createObjects(&input,"source input",
00045             "source","main source","createSource");
00046 
00047     if( !o ) egsFatal("Got null object\n");
00048 
00049     EGS_BaseSource *s = dynamic_cast<EGS_BaseSource *>(o);
00050     if( !s ) egsFatal("This is not a source object\n");
00051 
00052     egsInformation("Source description: %s\n",s->getSourceDescription());
00053 
00054     EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm = EGS_RandomGenerator::defaultRNG();
00055     int q, latch; EGS_Float E, wt; EGS_Vector x,u;
00056     for(int j=0; j<10000; j++) {
00057         s->getNextParticle(rndm,q,latch,E,wt,x,u);
00058         egsWarning("%g %g %g\n",x.x,x.y,x.z);
00059     }
00060 
00061     delete factory;
00062 
00063     return 0;
00064 
00065 }
